card.name: Archangel
card.property: Flying, vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My mother once told me angels sing their swords' names with each strike." —Sisay, Captain of the Weatherlight

card.name: Daraja Griffin
card.property: Flying Sacrifice Daraja Griffin: Destroy target black creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "And the flamingos said, 'Get out of our nest—we can't be seen with the likes of you!' So, the griffin ate them." —Azeworai, "The Ugly Bird"

card.name: Equipoise
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, for each land target player controls in excess of the number you control, choose a land that player controls, then the chosen permanents phase out. Repeat this process for artifacts and creatures. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before that player untaps during their next untap step.)

card.name: Eye of Singularity
card.property: When Eye of Singularity enters the battlefield, destroy each permanent with the same name as another permanent, except for basic lands. They can't be regenerated. Whenever a permanent other than a basic land enters the battlefield, destroy all other permanents with that name. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Freewind Falcon
card.property: Flying, protection from red

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That does it! I'm going back to hunting chickens!" —Rhirhok, goblin archer

card.name: Gossamer Chains
card.property: Return Gossamer Chains to its owner's hand: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target unblocked creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Harah swung his sword mightily, but still the air held him fast." —Azeworai, "Kenechi's Dream"

card.name: Honorable Passage
card.property: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to any target this turn, prevent that damage. If damage from a red source is prevented this way, Honorable Passage deals that much damage to the source's controller.

card.name: Hope Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Target creature gains first strike until end of turn. • Target player gains 2 life. • Destroy target Aura.

card.name: Infantry Veteran
card.property: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The true dishonor for a soldier is surviving the war." —Telim'Tor

card.name: Jamuraan Lion
card.property: {W}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The lion blinked —Femeref expression meaning "situation avoided"

card.name: Knight of Valor
card.property: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.) {1}{W}: Each creature without flanking blocking Knight of Valor gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Longbow Archer
card.property: First strike; reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If it bears wings, I will pin it to the skies over Tefemburu." —Ruya, Zhalfirin archer

card.name: Miraculous Recovery
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You stop breathing for just a few minutes and everyone jumps to conclusions." —Zarkuu, necrosavant

card.name: Parapet
card.property: You may cast Parapet as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step. Creatures you control get +0/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is no wall that can't be improved by making it taller.

card.name: Peace Talks
card.property: This turn and next turn, creatures can't attack, and players and permanents can't be the targets of spells or activated abilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By the tongues of a thousand serpents, this time I do not lie." —Ahmahz il Kin, Suq'Ata diplomat

card.name: Relic Ward
card.property: You may cast Relic Ward as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step. Enchant artifact Enchanted artifact has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Asmira's prayers alone should have freed Mangara from the amber prison . . .

card.name: Remedy
card.property: Prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of targets, divided as you choose.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These things will protect you while I'm gone, remind you of my love for you." —"Love Song of Night and Day"

card.name: Resistance Fighter
card.property: Sacrifice Resistance Fighter: Prevent all combat damage target creature would deal this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My soldiers fought without hesitation, died without doubt." —Sidar Jabari

card.name: Retribution of the Meek
card.property: Destroy all creatures with power 4 or greater. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tread upon the meek, and they shall wound your feet and make you crawl."—Asmira, Holy Avenger

card.name: Righteous Aura
card.property: {W}, Pay 2 life: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Good is not a 'thing.' You can neither touch nor own it. No, Good is a vision we all share and strive to make real." —Asmira, Holy Avenger

card.name: Sun Clasp
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+3. {W}: Return enchanted creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "And darkness shall be cast from me For my soul resides in the Sun." —Femeref dirge

card.name: Teferi's Honor Guard
card.property: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.) {U}{U}: Teferi's Honor Guard phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before you untap during your next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They may seem ceremonial, but their swords are still sharp." —Kipkemboi, Kukemssa pirate

card.name: Tithe
card.property: Search your library for a Plains card. If target opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for an additional Plains card. Reveal those cards and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Warrior's Honor
card.property: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are to be bound together as the reeds of a basket." —Asmira, Rashida, and Jabari, unity chant

card.name: Zhalfirin Crusader
card.property: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.) {1}{W}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Zhalfirin Crusader this turn is dealt to any target instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "War is the crucible of leadership." —Rashida Scalebane

card.name: Betrayal
card.property: Enchant creature an opponent controls Whenever enchanted creature becomes tapped, you draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes a burden can be borne only on the shoulders of a willing enemy." —Suq'Ata aphorism

card.name: Breezekeeper
card.property: Flying Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He blows a gust across the cliff to vanish in a breath of wind." —"Song of the Wind Being"

card.name: Chronatog
card.property: {0}: Chronatog gets +3/+3 until end of turn. You skip your next turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the chronatog, there is no meal like the present.

card.name: Cloud Elemental
card.property: Flying Cloud Elemental can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You know you've angered the gods when the clouds turn against you." —Sisay, Captain of the Weatherlight

card.name: Desertion
card.property: Counter target spell. If an artifact or creature spell is countered this way, put that card onto the battlefield under your control instead of into its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: First the insult, then the injury.

card.name: Dream Tides
card.property: Creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may choose any number of tapped nongreen creatures they control and pay {2} for each creature chosen this way. If the player does, untap those creatures.

card.name: Flooded Shoreline
card.property: {U} {U}, Return two Islands you control to their owner's hand: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some say the sea is jealous of the land and wishes to climb its heights to meet the sky."—Afari, *Tales*

card.name: Foreshadow
card.property: Choose a card name, then target opponent puts the top card of their library into their graveyard. If that card has the chosen name, you draw a card. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Impulse
card.property: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Controlling time ensures you need never look impulsive again." —Teferi

card.name: Inspiration
card.property: Target player draws two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Madness and genius are separated only by degrees of success." —Sidar Jabari

card.name: Knight of the Mists
card.property: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.) When Knight of the Mists enters the battlefield, you may pay {U}. If you don't, destroy target Knight and it can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fear the mists, for they are armed.

card.name: Man-o'-War
card.property: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch." —Naimah, Femeref philosopher

card.name: Mystic Veil
card.property: You may cast Mystic Veil as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step. Enchant creature Enchanted creature has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Magic is my thread, my will the needle. I weave over you as if you never were." —Poetics of Hanan

card.name: Ovinomancer
card.property: When Ovinomancer enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return three basic lands you control to their owner's hand. {T}, Return Ovinomancer to its owner's hand: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. That creature's controller creates a 0/1 green Sheep creature token.

card.name: Prosperity
card.property: Each player draws X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wealth is a good thing, compared to poverty—your food is better, your robes are softer, and your companions have bathed more recently." —Kipkemboi, Kukemssa pirate

card.name: Rainbow Efreet
card.property: Flying {U}{U}: Rainbow Efreet phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before you untap during your next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A beauty made more so by its fleeting visitations." —Teferi

card.name: Shimmering Efreet
card.property: Flying Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.) Whenever Shimmering Efreet phases in, target creature phases out. (It phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Life or death: which is the illusion?" —Naimah, Femeref philosopher

card.name: Shrieking Drake
card.property: Flying When Shrieking Drake enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kaervek believes the drakes' cries herald his victory; in truth, they mourn aloud for his impending demise." —Teferi

card.name: Teferi's Realm
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses artifact, creature, land, or non-Aura enchantment. All nontoken permanents of that type phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. Each one phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fire is dead. Water has killed him." —From The Stories of Nature

card.name: Three Wishes
card.property: Exile the top three cards of your library face down. You may look at those cards for as long as they remain exiled. Until your next turn, you may play those cards. At the beginning of your next upkeep, put any of those cards you didn't play into your graveyard.

card.name: Time and Tide
card.property: Simultaneously, all phased-out creatures phase in and all creatures with phasing phase out.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Time may heal all wounds, but what heals time?" —Teferi

card.name: Undo
card.property: Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oft have I wished to undo past deeds, but never did I imagine they would be undone for me." —Naimah, Femeref philosopher

card.name: Vanishing
card.property: Enchant creature {U}{U}: Enchanted creature phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Careless, like a child with fire, so was I with time." —Teferi

card.name: Vision Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Target player puts the top four cards of their library into their graveyard. • Choose a land type and a basic land type. Each land of the first chosen type becomes the second chosen type until end of turn. • Target artifact phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.)

card.name: Waterspout Djinn
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Waterspout Djinn unless you return an untapped Island you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fly us higher, out of its storm." —Sisay, Captain of the Weatherlight

card.name: Aku Djinn
card.property: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature each opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your arrogance amazes me, Kaervek. Did you not know the price you would pay?" —Mangara

card.name: Blanket of Night
card.property: Each land is a Swamp in addition to its other land types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kaervek imprisoned Mangara out of jealousy, but he taints Jamuraa simply out of spite." —Asmira, Holy Avenger

card.name: Brood of Cockroaches
card.property: When Brood of Cockroaches is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, at the beginning of the next end step, you lose 1 life and return Brood of Cockroaches to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's like waking on a bed of a thousand olives during an earthquake of subtle force."—Afari, *Tales*

card.name: Coercion
card.property: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A rhino's bargain —Femeref expression meaning "a situation with no choices"

card.name: Crypt Rats
card.property: {X}: Crypt Rats deals X damage to each creature and each player. Spend only black mana on X.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once I dreamt of death, but now it dreams of me / And only rats and rotting flesh can hear my silent plea." —Mundungu chant

card.name: Dark Privilege
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As you breathe your last, understand why I accept such forbidden gifts." —Purraj of Urborg

card.name: Death Watch
card.property: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, its controller loses life equal to its power and you gain life equal to its toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Watch death wait / Wait, death, watch / Steal breath swiftly / but steal life slowly." —Suq'Ata dirge

card.name: Desolation
card.property: At the beginning of each end step, each player who tapped a land for mana this turn sacrifices a land. Desolation deals 2 damage to each player who sacrificed a Plains this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kill a creature, destroy the present. Kill the land, destroy the future." —Kaervek

card.name: Fallen Askari
card.property: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.) Fallen Askari can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In troubled times, there are few greater sorrows than a wayward savior.

card.name: Forbidden Ritual
card.property: Sacrifice a nontoken permanent. If you do, target opponent loses 2 life unless that player sacrifices a permanent or discards a card. You may repeat this process any number of times.

card.name: Funeral Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Target player discards a card. • Target creature gets +2/-1 until end of turn. • Target creature gains swampwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

card.name: Infernal Harvest
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, return X Swamps you control to their owner's hand. Infernal Harvest deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I offered you eternal life; I just didn't say where." —Shauku, Endbringer

card.name: Kaervek's Spite
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice all permanents you control and discard your hand. Target player loses 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The end justifies the means. What do I care if I rule over the dead rather than over the living? The dead ask fewer questions." —Kaervek

card.name: Necromancy
card.property: You may cast Necromancy as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step. When Necromancy enters the battlefield, if it's on the battlefield, it becomes an Aura with "enchant creature put onto the battlefield with Necromancy." Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control and attach Necromancy to it. When Necromancy leaves the battlefield, that creature's controller sacrifices it.

card.name: Necrosavant

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ah, I remember my first death." —Zarkuu, necrosavant

card.name: Nekrataal
card.property: First strike When Nekrataal enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. That creature can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen the horrors Kaervek has freed. My betrayal is certain—but of Kaervek or of Jamuraa, I cannot say." —Jolrael

card.name: Pillar Tombs of Aku
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may sacrifice a creature. If that player doesn't, they lose 5 life and you sacrifice Pillar Tombs of Aku.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Aku, City of Hidden Graves / Aku, City of Lost Kings / Aku, welcome me." —Pillar tomb inscription

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How can you claim the gods are merciless when they robbed the snake of its limbs to give the other creatures a sporting chance?" —Hakim, Loreweaver

card.name: Suq'Ata Assassin
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Whenever Suq'Ata Assassin attacks and isn't blocked, defending player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

card.name: Tar Pit Warrior
card.property: When Tar Pit Warrior becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The cyclops shrugged off savage blows, but casual insults made him weep."—Azeworai, *"The Cyclops who Couldn't"*

card.name: Urborg Mindsucker
card.property: {B}, Sacrifice Urborg Mindsucker: Target opponent discards a card at random. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My pet will pick the ripe fruit from your tortured brain as if it were hanging from a vine." —Kaervek

card.name: Vampiric Tutor
card.property: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I write upon clean white parchment with a sharp quill and the blood of my students, divining their secrets." —Shauku, Endbringer

card.name: Vampirism
card.property: Enchant creature When Vampirism enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control. Other creatures you control get -1/-1.

card.name: Wake of Vultures
card.property: Flying {1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Wake of Vultures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So the vulture said to the griffin, 'You gonna eat that?'" —Azeworai, "The Ugly Bird"

card.name: Wicked Reward
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Target creature gets +4/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The blood on my hands is merely proof of my ambition." —Kaervek

card.name: Bogardan Phoenix
card.property: Flying When Bogardan Phoenix dies, exile it if it had a death counter on it. Otherwise, return it to the battlefield under your control and put a death counter on it.

card.name: Dwarven Vigilantes
card.property: Whenever Dwarven Vigilantes attacks and isn't blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Dwarven Vigilantes assigns no combat damage this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some dwarves can only be pushed so far.

card.name: Elkin Lair
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player exiles a card at random from their hand. The player may play that card this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, if the player hasn't played the card, they put it into their graveyard.

card.name: Fireblast
card.property: You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Fireblast deals 4 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Embermages aren't well known for their diplomatic skills.

card.name: Goblin Recruiter
card.property: When Goblin Recruiter enters the battlefield, search your library for any number of Goblin cards and reveal those cards. Shuffle your library, then put them on top of it in any order.

card.name: Goblin Swine-Rider
card.property: Whenever Goblin Swine-Rider becomes blocked, it deals 2 damage to each attacking creature and each blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May you get the mount you deserve." —Suq'Ata curse

card.name: Hearth Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Destroy target artifact creature. • Attacking creatures get +1/+0 until end of turn. • Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Heat Wave
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Blue creatures can't block creatures you control. Nonblue creatures can't block creatures you control unless their controller pays 1 life for each blocking creature they control.

card.name: Hulking Cyclops
card.property: Hulking Cyclops can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some say a great cyclops turns the world in its hands, looking down upon it with its one bright eye."—Afari, *Tales*

card.name: Keeper of Kookus
card.property: {R}: Keeper of Kookus gains protection from red until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wanted: Thick-skinned goblin for guarding mean ol' Kookus. Must like fires. Must heal quickly.

card.name: Kookus
card.property: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, if you don't control a creature named Keeper of Kookus, Kookus deals 3 damage to you and attacks this turn if able. {R}: Kookus gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Lightning Cloud
card.property: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may pay {R}. If you do, Lightning Cloud deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mightiest clouds sit upon spires of fire. —Femeref adage

card.name: Mob Mentality
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has trample. Whenever all non-Wall creatures you control attack, enchanted creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of attacking creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why is loud stupidity so infectious?" —Rana, Suq'Ata market fool

card.name: Ogre Enforcer
card.property: Ogre Enforcer can't be destroyed by lethal damage unless lethal damage dealt by a single source is marked on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ate up all of his siblings in the first week. A good beginning for one destined to command." —Suka, ogre matron

card.name: Raging Gorilla
card.property: Whenever Raging Gorilla blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every temper tantrum makes another angry gorilla." —Femeref children's myth

card.name: Relentless Assault
card.property: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Flog and Squee / Up the tree / See the army / Flee, flee, flee." —Goblin nursery rhyme/war cry

card.name: Rock Slide
card.property: Rock Slide deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target attacking or blocking creatures without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Good ol' rock. Nothing beats rock." —Rhirhok, goblin archer

card.name: Solfatara
card.property: Target player can't play lands this turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A burst of hot air tossed the moon into the air, and the moon liked it up there so much it never needed the ground again."—Azeworai, *"Glitter Moon"*

card.name: Song of Blood
card.property: Put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard. Whenever a creature attacks this turn, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each creature card put into your graveyard this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Purraj sang slaughter and danced death.

card.name: Spitting Drake
card.property: Flying {R}: Spitting Drake gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Suq'Ata Lancer
card.property: Haste Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Never stop 'til you see your lance come out the other side." —Telim'Tor

card.name: Talruum Champion
card.property: First strike Whenever Talruum Champion blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, that creature loses first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the Talruum language, there is no word for "surprised."

card.name: Talruum Piper
card.property: All creatures with flying able to block Talruum Piper do so.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the Talruum began to play, the dragons fell from the sky to squash the obnoxious noise.

card.name: Tremor
card.property: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Where do you run when the earth becomes your enemy?" —Naimah, Femeref philosopher

card.name: Viashino Sandstalker
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) At the beginning of the end step, return Viashino Sandstalker to its owner's hand. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some believe Sandstalkers to be illusions; those with scars know better." —Zhalfirin Guide to the Desert

card.name: Bull Elephant
card.property: When Bull Elephant enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return two Forests you control to their owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Four gray trees and a long, coiling snake. What am I? —Zhalfirin riddle

card.name: City of Solitude
card.property: Players can cast spells and activate abilities only during their own turns.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My horizon was the arcing petals, my new home resplendent with spires of weeds and pillows of fragrant pollen." —Naimah, Femeref philosopher

card.name: Creeping Mold
card.property: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

card.name: Elephant Grass
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Black creatures can't attack you. Nonblack creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How have I angered nature that she would imprison me in a labyrinth of grass?"—Kasib ibn Naji, Letters

card.name: Elven Cache
card.property: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The elves can hide better than most can look." —Mwani, Mtenda herder

card.name: Emerald Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Untap target permanent. • Destroy target non-Aura enchantment. • Target creature loses flying until end of turn.

card.name: Feral Instinct
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If a rhino's head is lower than its shoulders, trust me—it is not praying." —Mwani, Mtenda herder

card.name: Giant Caterpillar
card.property: {G}, Sacrifice Giant Caterpillar: Create a 1/1 green Insect creature token with flying named Butterfly at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "'I've seen hornworms big as a man's fist,' the traveler said, and nodded soberly when our jaws went slack at his ignorance."—Afari, *Tales*

card.name: Katabatic Winds
card.property: Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.) Creatures with flying can't attack or block, and their activated abilities with {T} in their costs can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wind will win, whatever we wish.

card.name: King Cheetah
card.property: Flash

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you find yourself and a friend being chased by a King Cheetah, you have but one chance: Trip your friend. —Suq'Ata wisdom

card.name: Kyscu Drake
card.property: Flying {G}: Kyscu Drake gets +0/+1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn. Sacrifice Kyscu Drake and a creature named Spitting Drake: Search your library for a card named Viashivan Dragon and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Lichenthrope
card.property: If damage would be dealt to Lichenthrope, put that many -1/-1 counters on it instead. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a -1/-1 counter from Lichenthrope.

card.name: Mortal Wound
card.property: Enchant creature When enchanted creature is dealt damage, destroy it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Their tears spill over Jamuraa. Mixed with blood, they wash everything red."—*"Love Song of Night and Day"*

card.name: Natural Order
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a green creature. Search your library for a green creature card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: . . . but the price of Mangara's freedom was Asmira's life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you run you're graceful and swift, sleek as a powerful panther."—*"Love Song of Night and Day"*

card.name: Quirion Druid
card.property: {G}, {T}: Target land becomes a 2/2 green creature that's still a land. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The land has been gracious enough to let you tread upon her for years. That privilege is about to end." —Liefellen, Quirion exarch

card.name: Quirion Ranger
card.property: Return a Forest you control to its owner's hand: Untap target creature. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Respect the earth, for it will one day be your shield and another day your blanket." —Liefellen, Quirion exarch

card.name: River Boa
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) {G}: Regenerate River Boa.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "But no one heard the snake's gentle hiss for peace over the elephant's trumpeting of war." —Afari, Tales

card.name: Rowen
card.property: Reveal the first card you draw each turn. Whenever you reveal a basic land card this way, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've dreamt of a second harvest but fear I will not see it." —Asmira, Holy Avenger

card.name: Spider Climb
card.property: You may cast Spider Climb as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step. Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+3 and has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)

card.name: Stampeding Wildebeests
card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) At the beginning of your upkeep, return a green creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Prayers for rain are answered with the thunder of hooves.

card.name: Summer Bloom
card.property: You may play up to three additional lands this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our love is like the river in the summer season of long rains. / For a little while it spilled its banks, flooding the crops in the fields."—*"Love Song of Night and Day"*

card.name: Uktabi Orangutan
card.property: When Uktabi Orangutan enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Is it true that the apes wear furs of gold when they marry?" —Rana, Suq'Ata market fool

card.name: Warthog
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Too much work—it takes a long time to break them in, and more than a few recruits." —Grebog, goblin swine-rider

card.name: Wind Shear
card.property: Attacking creatures with flying get -2/-2 and lose flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As the winds abated, there was a shower of dragonscales, then nothing more."—Azeworai, *"The Unruly Wind"*

card.name: Army Ants
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a land: Destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not underestimate the power of many against one." —Sidar Jabari

card.name: Breathstealer's Crypt
card.property: If a player would draw a card, instead they draw a card and reveal it. If it's a creature card, that player discards it unless they pay 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Far too many soldiers have died in their beds." —Telim'Tor

card.name: Corrosion
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) At the beginning of your upkeep, put a rust counter on each artifact target opponent controls. Then destroy each artifact with converted mana cost less than or equal to the number of rust counters on it. Artifacts destroyed this way can't be regenerated. When Corrosion leaves the battlefield, remove all rust counters from all permanents.

card.name: Femeref Enchantress
card.property: Whenever an enchantment is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Then she spread a fine dust over the land, like a butterfly shaking its wing."—*"The Enchantress,"* Femeref tale

card.name: Firestorm Hellkite
card.property: Flying, trample Cumulative upkeep {U}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If it can scar the sky with fire, do not share its destination." —Mwani, Mtenda herder

card.name: Guiding Spirit
card.property: Flying {T}: If the top card of target player's graveyard is a creature card, put that card on top of that player's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Retainer of eternal Sun! Life flash again upon thy wings."—*"Song to the Sun,"* Femeref song

card.name: Mundungu
card.property: {T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} and 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our buried kings silently await the revolt of dead peasants." —Tuwile, mundungu of Aku

card.name: Pygmy Hippo
card.property: Whenever Pygmy Hippo attacks and isn't blocked, you may have defending player activate a mana ability of each land they control and lose all unspent mana. If you do, Pygmy Hippo assigns no combat damage this turn and at the beginning of your next main phase this turn, you add an amount of {C} equal to the amount of mana that player lost this way.

card.name: Righteous War
card.property: White creatures you control have protection from black. Black creatures you control have protection from white.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is a war without neutrality." —Asmira, Holy Avenger

card.name: Scalebane's Elite
card.property: Protection from black

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With Rashida's blades, my guiding vision and the luck of the blessed, today we will free Mangara!" —Asmira, Holy Avenger

card.name: Simoon
card.property: Simoon deals 1 damage to each creature target opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The black-and-white sacred monkey holds her children to her, and waits."—*"Love Song of Night and Day"*

card.name: Squandered Resources
card.property: Sacrifice a land: Add one mana of any type the sacrificed land could produce.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He traded sand for skins, skins for gold, gold for life. In the end, he traded life for sand."—Afari, *Tales*

card.name: Suleiman's Legacy
card.property: When Suleiman's Legacy enters the battlefield, destroy all Djinns and Efreets. They can't be regenerated. Whenever a Djinn or Efreet enters the battlefield, destroy it. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With Suleiman's ascension to power, the djinn and efreets of ancient Rabiah learned humility.

card.name: Tempest Drake
card.property: Flying, vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Its speed will be equaled only by the swiftness of my enemy's fall." —Kaervek

card.name: Viashivan Dragon
card.property: Flying {R}: Viashivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {G}: Viashivan Dragon gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Viashivan understand that cruelty arises from opportunity.

card.name: Anvil of Bogardan
card.property: Players have no maximum hand size. At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card, then discards a card.

card.name: Brass-Talon Chimera
card.property: First strike Sacrifice Brass-Talon Chimera: Put a +2/+2 counter on target Chimera creature. It gains first strike. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Diamond Kaleidoscope
card.property: {3}, {T}: Create a 0/1 colorless Prism artifact creature token. Sacrifice a Prism token: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A pretty toy. Now show me its tactical applications." —Telim'Tor

card.name: Dragon Mask
card.property: {3}, {T}: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With no further options, I was forced to don the mask." —Rashida Scalebane

card.name: Helm of Awakening
card.property: Spells cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This little prize will cover your head, your spells, your bets, and your behind!" —Pashad ibn Asim, Suq'Ata trader

card.name: Iron-Heart Chimera
card.property: Vigilance Sacrifice Iron-Heart Chimera: Put a +2/+2 counter on target Chimera creature. It gains vigilance. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Juju Bubble
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When you play a card, sacrifice Juju Bubble. {2}: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If my heart had a lid, I would lift it and show you my joy." —From Suq'Ata wedding ceremony

card.name: Lead-Belly Chimera
card.property: Trample Sacrifice Lead-Belly Chimera: Put a +2/+2 counter on target Chimera creature. It gains trample. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Magma Mine
card.property: {4}: Put a pressure counter on Magma Mine. {T}, Sacrifice Magma Mine: It deals damage equal to the number of pressure counters on it to any target.

card.name: Matopi Golem
card.property: {1}: Regenerate Matopi Golem. When it regenerates this way, put a -1/-1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some potmakers claim to use the mud of such creatures to make their finest bowls—and that the bowls scream when fired.

card.name: Phyrexian Marauder
card.property: Phyrexian Marauder enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. Phyrexian Marauder can't block. Phyrexian Marauder can't attack unless you pay {1} for each +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have heard terrible tales of black rains, ashen fields, and metal that screams. I have consoled myself that the tales were a myth of some fevered mind. But today I saw a walker—and now I fear the truth." —Kasib Ibn Naji, Letters

card.name: Sands of Time
card.property: Each player skips their untap step. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player simultaneously untaps each tapped artifact, creature, and land they control and taps each untapped artifact, creature, and land they control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "But once, with a magician's help, Time was stopped and Day stood still."—*"Love Song of Night and Day"*

card.name: Sisay's Ring
card.property: {T}: Add {C}{C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With this ring, you have friends in worlds you've never heard of."—Sisay, Captain of the *Weatherlight*

card.name: Snake Basket
card.property: {X}, Sacrifice Snake Basket: Create X 1/1 green Snake creature tokens. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Uh, does anyone have a flute?" —Rana, Suq'Ata market fool

card.name: Teferi's Puzzle Box
card.property: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player puts the cards in their hand on the bottom of their library in any order, then draws that many cards.

card.name: Tin-Wing Chimera
card.property: Flying Sacrifice Tin-Wing Chimera: Put a +2/+2 counter on target Chimera creature. It gains flying. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Triangle of War
card.property: {2}, Sacrifice Triangle of War: Target creature you control fights target creature an opponent controls. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Zhalfirin war triangle represents a trinity of might, faith, and guile.

card.name: Wand of Denial
card.property: {T}: Look at the top card of target player's library. If it's a nonland card, you may pay 2 life. If you do, put it into that player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You'll never miss what you never had.

card.name: Coral Atoll
card.property: Coral Atoll enters the battlefield tapped. When Coral Atoll enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return an untapped Island you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {C}{U}.

card.name: Dormant Volcano
card.property: Dormant Volcano enters the battlefield tapped. When Dormant Volcano enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return an untapped Mountain you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {C}{R}.

card.name: Everglades
card.property: Everglades enters the battlefield tapped. When Everglades enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return an untapped Swamp you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {C}{B}.

card.name: Griffin Canyon
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Untap target Griffin. If it's a creature, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Where are falling feathers deadlier than falling rock?" —The One Thousand Questions

card.name: Jungle Basin
card.property: Jungle Basin enters the battlefield tapped. When Jungle Basin enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return an untapped Forest you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {C}{G}.

card.name: Karoo
card.property: Karoo enters the battlefield tapped. When Karoo enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return an untapped Plains you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {C}{W}.

card.name: Quicksand
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice Quicksand: Target attacking creature without flying gets -1/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Undiscovered Paradise
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color. During your next untap step, as you untap your permanents, return Undiscovered Paradise to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jolrael's choice of homes was far better than her choice of allies.
